h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 2 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Find the Boar at Crouching Tiger Temple
content: From the Temple Entrance Keeper's Shrine, head up the stairs and take the turning on the right just before you reach the top. You'll see the Yellow-Robed Squire slouched against the wall. When you speak to him he'll ask you for a treat of a **Jade Lotus**. If you don't have any of these, look for areas where there's water. You just need one; when you have it, bring it back to him and he'll move on from the Crouching Tiger Temple.

The content is as follows:
From the Temple Entrance Keeper's Shrine, head up the stairs and take the turning on the right just before you reach the top. You'll see the Yellow-Robed Squire slouched against the wall. When you speak to him he'll ask you for a treat of a **Jade Lotus**. If you don't have any of these, look for areas where there's water. You just need one; when you have it, bring it back to him and he'll move on from the Crouching Tiger Temple.
